description: The Ramble Collection brings all the cozy comforts of your favorite hoodie, for your feet. As you recover around the campfire, slide into the comfort of the Ramble Puff Clog. Built with a soft fleece lining, Chaco’s signature LUVSEAT™ footbed, and an easy on-off design – your feet will thank you.
name: Chaco Ramble Puff Clog - Mens
